com.aikinparker.events

Class NotificationCenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aikinparker.events.DefaultEventDispatcher
      • com.aikinparker.events.NotificationCenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventDispatcher

    public class NotificationCenter
extends DefaultEventDispatcher
    A simple singleton wrapper for DefaultEventDispatcher. Made to imitate the behavior of the iOS NSNotificationCenter.
